metadata.name: Covers #77
metadata.description:
This photograph is part of my project Covers which documents record covers shot in various locations around the world. Since 2014 I have tracked down the locations of these record covers and re-photographed them in their original setting, decades later.

This photograph of Ice Cubeâ€™s AmeriKKKa's Most Wanted album was taken on the corner of S Broadway and W Olympic Blvd, Downtown Los Angeles, USA

This series has been widely published online and the photographs have been exhibited around the world.
